amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to improving services and interventions relating to sexual assault, family violence, domestic violence, dating violence, and child abuse.

vote.text: Amendment SA 834 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 100 - 0. Record Vote Number: 27.

action.text: Amendment SA 834 proposed by Senator Shaheen. (consideration: CR S442; text as modified: CR S442) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to improving services and interventions relating to sexual assault, family violence, domestic violence, dating violence, and child abuse.
